title: Mobile Intelligent Network Lab 210
text:
We are currently recruiting!



If you are interested in joining the lab as a Graduate student, please consider applying.


The mobile intelligent network laboratory is committed to developing communication network signal processing technology, including signal processing using statistical detection and estimation and machine learning, and developing network protocol prototypes for different platforms using software.
行動智慧型網路實驗室致力於發展通訊網路信號處理的技術，包含利用統計的偵測與估計以及機器學習進行訊號處理，及利用軟體針對不同平台開發網路協定的原型。

title: Research Direction
text:
本實驗室著重於利用軟體開發通訊系統、網路協定與訊號處理技術，包含使用軟體無線電平台 (Software-defined radio)、軟體定義網路 (Software-defined networking)與不同類別的物聯網(Internet of Things)平台。
近期也專注於訊號處理的應用，包含應用深度學習進行無線定位 (Wireless Localization)、無線偵測 (Wireless Sensing)，以及心臟醫學影像(Medical Imaging)辨識與分析與網路資訊安全 (Network Security)。
目前研究方向包含：

Deep Learning for Wireless Sensing
Software-Defined Network
Deep Learning for Medical imaging
Indoor Positioning using Channel State Information


Deep Learning for Wireless Sensing

Gesture Recognition
Indoor Localization




Software-Defined Network

Mesh Networks for Security
Radar Sensor Networks




Deep Learning for Medical imaging

Medical Image Segmentation  



Indoor Positioning using Channel State Information
